form.label: Change Monitoring
form.description: View recent changes made on connected Illumio PCEs

search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Illumio.Audit WHERE Audit.category="auditable" (Audit.action="created" OR Audit.action="updated" OR Audit.action="deleted") Audit.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ Audit.org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ (Audit.user=$user_tok|s$ OR Audit.src_user=$user_tok|s$) Audit.object_category=$resource_type_tok|s$ BY _time Audit.action Audit.object_category Audit.user
| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Illumio.Audit BY Audit.pce_fqdn
| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Illumio.Audit WHERE Audit.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ BY Audit.org_id

| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Illumio.Audit WHERE Audit.category="auditable" (Audit.action="created" OR Audit.action="updated" OR Audit.action="deleted") Audit.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ Audit.org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ BY Audit.src_user

| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Illumio.Audit WHERE Audit.category="auditable" (Audit.action="created" OR Audit.action="updated" OR Audit.action="deleted") Audit.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ Audit.org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ BY Audit.object_category

`illumio_get_index` sourcetype="illumio:pce" event_type="sec_policy.create" pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ (user=$user_tok|s$ OR src_user=$user_tok|s$) | spath path=resource_changes{} output=resource_changes | mvexpand resource_changes | spath input=resource_changes path=changes.workloads_affected.after output=workloads_affected | spath input=resource_changes path=resource.sec_policy.commit_message output=commit_message | spath input=resource_changes path=resource.sec_policy.modified_objects output=modified_objects | spath input=resource_changes path=resource.sec_policy.version output=policy_version | eval modifications = "" | foreach resource_changes{}.resource.sec_policy.modified_objects.*.*.action [| eval modifications = mvdedup(mvappend(modifications, '<<FIELD>>' + " <<MATCHSEG1>> object " + spath(modified_objects, "<<MATCHSEG1>>.<<MATCHSEG2>>.name") + " with HREF <<MATCHSEG2>>"))] | rename created_by.user.username AS Username | fillnull value="-" | table timestamp, pce_fqdn, Username, policy_version, workloads_affected, commit_message, modifications, href | rename timestamp AS Timestamp, pce_fqdn AS "PCE", policy_version AS "Policy Version", workloads_affected AS "Workloads Affected", commit_message AS "Commit Message", modifications AS "Modified Objects", href AS "Event HREF" | eval Timestamp=strptime('Timestamp',"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f%Z") | fieldformat "Timestamp"=strftime('Timestamp',"%+") | sort - Timestamp

table.fields: Timestamp PCE Username "Workloads Affected" "Commit Message" "Modified Objects"

search.query: | stats sum(count) AS Count BY Audit.object_category | rename Audit.object_category AS "Change Type" | sort - Count
| stats sum(count) AS Count BY Audit.user | rename Audit.user AS "Username" | sort - Count

`illumio_get_index` sourcetype="illumio:pce" (NOT "system_events") (action="created" OR action="updated" OR action="deleted") pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ (user=$user_tok|s$ OR src_user=$user_tok|s$) change_type=$resource_type_tok|s$ | spath path=resource_changes{}.resource output=resources | mvexpand resources | eval resource_types=json_array_to_mv(json_keys(resources)) | mvexpand resource_types | eval resource_details=spath(resources, resource_types) | eval properties=json_array_to_mv(json_keys(resource_details)) | mvexpand properties | eval properties=properties + ": " + json_extract_exact(resource_details, properties) | eval properties=if(len(properties) > 100, substr(properties, 1, 100) + "...", properties) | mvcombine properties | rename created_by.user.username AS Username | fillnull value="-" | table timestamp, event_type, pce_fqdn, Username, properties, href | rename timestamp AS Timestamp, event_type AS "Event Type", pce_fqdn AS "PCE", properties AS "Resource Details", href AS "Event HREF" | eval Timestamp=strptime('Timestamp',"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%f%Z") | fieldformat "Timestamp"=strftime('Timestamp',"%+") | sort - Timestamp
